+func (s *server) renderPage(ctx context.Context, w io.Writer, templateName string, pageData *page) {
+	t, ok := s.Templates[templateName]
+	if !ok {
+		log.Printf(ctx, "Error: no template named %v", templateName)
+		return
+	}
+
+	pageData.Config = s.config
+	pageData.AssetHashes = s.AssetHashes
+
+	err := t.ExecuteTemplate(w, templateName, pageData)
+	if err != nil {
+		log.Printf(ctx, "Error rendering %v: %s", templateName, err)
+		return
+	}
+}
+
+type reloadHandler struct {
+	srv   *server
+	inner http.Handler
+}
+
+func (h *reloadHandler) ServeHTTP(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) {
+	h.srv.loadTemplates()
+	h.inner.ServeHTTP(w, r)
 }

+func LoadTemplates(base string, templates map[string]*template.Template) error {
+	pattern := base + "/templates/common/*.html"
+	common := template.New("").Funcs(getFuncs())
+	common = template.Must(common.ParseGlob(pattern))

+	paths, err := filepath.Glob(pattern)

+		return err
+	}
+	for _, path := range paths {
+		t := template.Must(common.Clone())
+		t = template.Must(t.ParseFiles(path))
+		templates[filepath.Base(path)] = t
 	}
 	return nil
